data.title: Founded
data.content: 1904:  Creation of Wafabank 1911: Creation of BCM 2003: Creation of Attijariwafa Bank

data.title: Products
data.content: Credit cards , consumer banking , corporate banking , finance and insurance , investment banking , mortgage loans , private banking , private equity , savings , Securities , asset management , wealth management

data.title: Subsidiaries
data.content: Attijari – Wafa Assurance – Wafasalaf – Wafa Immobilier – CBAO – Union Gabonaise de Banque – Crédit du Congo – BIM SA – Crédit du Sénégal – Société ivoirienne de banque – SCB Cameroun – BIA Togo – Attijari bank Mauritanie – Attijariwafa Bank Egypt – Cogebanque
